biography: David Hayter was born on February 6, 1969 in Santa Monica, California,  USA as David Bryan Hayter. He is known for writing the screenplays to  X-Men (2000), X-Men 2 (2003), and Watchmen (2009). He is best known as  the voice of Solid Snake in the English versions of the Metal Gear Solid  franchise.
name: David Hayter
